components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures from AT&T Network in the US to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages from AT&T Network in the US to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages from AT&T Network in the US to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with MO SMS from AT&T US failing to reach some Twilio numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 March 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 28 March 2025 at 21:55 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging  (Messaging Channels) and Verify - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 to 20:30 PDT on 04/02/2025. During the maintenance window, customers will experience the following issues with WhatsApp, RCS, and Facebook Messenger:

- Message delays: Inbound and outbound messages may be delayed by up to 5 minutes.
- Outbound message failures: Messages with a validity period of less than 100 seconds may fail with error code 30036.
- Sender management issues: Creation, updates, or deletions of senders may fail during this window and will need to be retried afterward

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Messaging Channels
ACCOUNT SECURITY - Verify

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 to 20:30 PDT on 04/02/2025. During the maintenance window, customers will experience the following issues with WhatsApp, RCS, and Facebook Messenger:

- Message delays: Inbound and outbound messages may be delayed by up to 5 minutes.
- Outbound message failures: Messages with a validity period of less than 100 seconds may fail with error code 30036.
- Sender management issues: Creation, updates, or deletions of senders may fail during this window and will need to be retried afterward

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Messaging Channels

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the TaskRouter database version in the US1 region. There are pre and post activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window. The actual database cut-over is expected to take approximately 3 minutes and would incur a downtime of less than 1 minute.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter
